title: Drawing, "Saucepan for General Mill", 1940–50
medium:
ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp in black ink at lower left corner: eva s. zeisel industrial design/431 RIVERSIDE DRIVE NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with alphabet notations and measuresments throughout;at lower left; HX-279/GENERAL MILLS, INC. MECH. DIVISION MINNEAPOLIS, MINNESOTA; designer's stamp: 7" SAUCE PAN[sic] BOTTOM

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Saucepan for General Mill", 1940–50.
1940–50. ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-18.
